item.description:
A special Sunday Brunch at SONO Brewhouse...

 

This restaurant is well known for it's beer selection, but did you know that they have a fabulous Sunday brunch that as one reviewer puts it " is to die for". Over 50 feet of delicious offerings which include (to mention just a few) a carving station, assorted entrees featuring Lobster Pot Pie, Mussels Fra Diavlo, Chicken Picatta, Chicken Marsala, Dim Sum, Crabmeat Stuffed Sole, a raw bar, Belgian Waffles, omelets made to order, bacon, sausage, potatoes, assorted salads, assorted breads and muffins, and a spectacular Viennese table with homemade delights! Oh, don't forget the UNLIMITED MIMOSAS, CHAMPAGNE, AND POINSETTIAS! All you can enjoy! OH MY!!! Take a look at the website...

    http://www.sonobrewhouse.com/brunchmenu.html

 

If this isn't enough to entice you well , because we are indulging ourselves at 1 pm...why not hang out with us a little later in the afternoon and sample their fantastic beer list. Enjoy the food, the libations, and the company. Let go a little...laugh alot! 

 

*  Sunday Brunch is $29.95...all you can eat and drink (Mimosas, Champagne and Poinsettias).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: We're Brewing Some Fun @ Brewhouse in SONO!
